mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_PRODUCT ( KPNUM, KPID, KPNAME, KPCOMPANY, KPFILE, KPCNT, KPPRICE, KPDESC, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES( #{kpnum}, #{kpid}, #{kpname}, #{kpcompany}, #{kpfile}, #{kpcnt}, #{kpprice}, #{kpdesc}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.KPNUM KPNUM ,A.KPID KPID ,A.KPNAME KPNAME ,A.KPCOMPANY KPCOMPANY ,A.KPFILE KPFILE ,A.KPCNT KPCNT ,A.KPPRICE KPPRICE ,A.KPDESC KPDESC ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM KOSMO_PRODUCT A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.KPNUM = #{kpnum}
